# tsuru_plan (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "tsuru_plan" "plan1" {
  name    = "plan1"
  cpu     = "1" // or "100m" or "200%"
  memory  = "1Gi"
  default = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **cpu** (String)
- **memory** (String)
- **name** (String)

### Optional

- **default** (Boolean)
- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
